summary: In this mod was added an Underground Vault in Nordic ruins where you can find a lot of training dummies, weapons racks and chests.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img43/4004/1logofm.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img833/1236/descriptionn.png[/IMG]
[center][size=4]In this mod was added an [b]Underground Vault[/b] in Nordic ruins where you can find a lot of training dummies, weapons racks and chests.[/size][/center]
[center][URL=http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=XZfaAwWS]???????? ?? ???????[/url][/center]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img708/6122/featuresg.png[/IMG]
[list]
[*] An entrance to [b]Underground Vault[/b] is located near [b]Riverwood village[/b]. Look for a marker on the map and see the [URL=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33770-1-1364983752.jpg]screenshot[/url].
[*] The Storage consists of three parts: the main hall with left and right wings, the weapon storage under the main hall (use a lift) and the smithy (behind the right side door).
[*] In the left and right wings you can find several rooms with dummies (20 per room, 160 total) and lift in the center, which you can stand on and take the lift down to the lower tier with additional two rooms.
[*] The lift is activated when you stand on it. But if it doesn\'t work you can use leverage.
[*] All dummies are standard.
[*] Navmesh is completed.
[/list]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/6076/recommendedmods.png[/IMG]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/url] [size=1]by SLuckyD[/size] - Highly recommended.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img14/853/thankspj.png[/IMG]
Notabenoid site and user [b]Violectra[/b] for translation of the description in English.
[URL=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=136649929]Steam link[/url]
author: HAobaPOT
